thread.title: Sky Living picks up Limitless TV series and Shonda Rhimes's The Catch - TV
thread.title_full: Sky Living picks up Limitless TV series and Shonda Rhimes's The Catch - TV News - Digital Spy

author: Ben Lee
title: Sky Living picks up Limitless TV series and Shonda Rhimes's The Catch - TV
text: Sky Living will be bringing US TV series Limitless and The Catch to UK viewers.The latest acquisitions follow the channel's pick-up of Jaimie Alexander's crime drama Blindspot. © CBS / Jeff NeumannLimitless Limitless is based on the 2011 movie of the same name and stars Jake McDorman as protagonist Brian Finch.Finch is forced into solving cases for the FBI using enhanced abilities acquired from taking the mysterious drug NZT, and works closely with Special Agents Harris (Jennifer Carpenter) and Boyle (Hill Harper).Bradley Cooper reprises his role from the film in the pilot episode, and will recur as his availability allows. © PA ImagesMireille Enos will star in The Catch The Catch, from Grey's Anatomy creator Shonda Rhimes, follows fraud investigator Alice Martin (Mireille Enos), who discovers that she is about to get conned by her fiancé (Peter Krause).However, Alice has her own secrets, and the couple's lies to each other lead to a dangerous and complex game of cat and mouse.On the new pick-ups, Sky Living director Julia Barry said: "At Sky Living, we know how passionate our customers are about our shows because they tell us how much they love them. So we're giving them even more. © NBC UniversalBlindspot "With these brilliant new series, we're adding some of the most talked-about, 'can't look away' TV to our alrady fantastic line-up of the biggest US network hits, really cementing Sky Living's reputation as the home of the most engrossing addictive drama out there."Sky Living also airs US shows including Grey's Anatomy, Bones, Scandal, Elementary and The Blacklist.
